Class MovieCapturer

java.lang.Object
  MovieCapturer
All Implemented Interfaces:
VideoCapturer
public class MovieCapturer
extends java.lang.Object
implements VideoCapturer

Class that captures a movie to a series of jpg frames
Copyright Georgia Institute of Technology 2007
